title: Motivational Quotes
whatsnew:
• 🚀 Initial launch: Welcoming users to a vast collection of motivational content

  • 🌐 Support for English (coming soon in Hindi too) quotes across multiple categories

  • ✨ Performance enhancements for faster loading and smoother browsing

  • ❤️ Favorites & sharing features added for easy saving and distribution of quotes

  • 🔔 Daily reminder notifications to keep inspiration flowing (This feature is coming soon)

🛠️ Usage Tips:

  • Use share to uplift others via WhatsApp, Instagram, and other platforms

  • Set daily reminders for a consistent motivational boost (This feature is coming soon)
longDescription:
Motivational Quotes by dhimanp is a free, web-based app designed to inspire and uplift users daily. Explore a curated collection of quotes in English across diverse categories such as self-improvement, success, life, love, and friendship. Whether you're looking for morning motivation, thoughtful reflections, or positive affirmations, our app offers:

  • 🎯 280+ high-quality quotes — thoughtfully organized for easy browsing

  • 🌟 20+ motivational categories, tailored for every mood and occasion

  • 🔄 Instant sharing and favorites — save and share quotes via WhatsApp, social media, or email

  • 📱 No login or download required — start reading and sharing quotes instantly

  • 🧘‍♂️ In-app notifications (coming soon) — receive daily motivational reminders

Perfect for professionals, students, and anyone seeking daily inspiration. Let these powerful quotes spark positivity, fuel productivity, and cultivate well-being in your everyday life.
